summary: This document is an email correspondence involving Bella Klein, Amanda Kirby, Harry Bailer, and Richard Kahn. The email discusses a confirmation request related to a Neptune database transaction, indicating a level of communication and coordination among the individuals regarding financial matters.

persons.name: Bella Klein
persons.context: Bella Klein is the sender of the email, requesting confirmation from Amanda Kirby.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the email, being asked to confirm information.

persons.name: Harry Bailer
persons.context: Harry Bailer is copied on the email, indicating he is involved in the communication.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is also copied on the email, suggesting he is part of the discussion.

keyFacts: The email was sent on November 7, 2013.
Bella Klein is requesting confirmation from Amanda Kirby regarding a transaction.
Harry Bailer and Richard Kahn are included in the email as CC recipients.
